Name: FedCom Accords
Details: In 3020, Archon Katrina Steiner of the Lyran Commonwealth issues a "Peace Proposal" to all of the Great Houses of the Inner Sphere.  Only First Prince Hanse Davion of the Federated Suns responded, initiating a dialogue between the two states.  Later that same year, the two Successor States signed the FedCom Accords, which formalized military, scientific and economic exchanges between the two states.
